item.title: PHE R packages
item.description: As part of our open data and data science strategy we create R packages, three of which we have made widely available through [CRAN](). The most popular is fingertipsR which reads data from Fingertips via the fingertips API. library(pacman) p_load(cranlogs, tidyverse) cran_plot <- function(packages = "fingertipsR", from = Sys.Date() - 365, to = Sys.Date(), title = "Plot"){ plot <- cranlogs::cran_downloads(packages = packages, to = to, from = from) %>% ggplot(aes(date, count, colour = package)) + geom_line(aes(group = package), colour = "grey", show.
